name: Playdate Megadrop
description:
Welcome to the Megadrop hub. 

Here you’ll find links to everything revealed by Strangest.io during the Playdate Community Awards. The bundle, the physical release, the demo, the games, they’re all right here. Go ahead and click on whatever title strikes your fancy, or all of them if you really wanna get on our good side. Whatever you do, don’t wait to check out the Shadow Gadget and Shining Gadget physical release page. The clock is ticking…

Drop #1: Paging Dr. Floppy! Drop #2: Shadow Gadget + Shining Gadget Gen2 Update Drop #3: Shadow + Shining Gadget Physical Edition Limited Release Drop #4: Snoik! Drop #5: Megadrop Megabundle Sale Drop #6: Wastebraver - Playable Combat Test! Drop #7: It's a secret. You'll have to watch our segment of the Playdate Community Awards show!
